data.oai_dc:dc: Capture data of raccoons and striped skunks in Montérégie and Estrie regions

Capture data of raccoons and striped skunks during wildlife surveys in Montérégie and Estrie regions, Québec, Canada. These data were used to illustrate the resampling method in the case study. The columns “X_METER” and “Y_METER” are X and Y projected coordinates (in meters) of live-trap locations. The locations were projected into UTM Zone 18N coordinates with NAD 1983 datum.
